extension_name.description: The title of the extension, displayed in the web store.

extension_description.message: Sichert bearbeitete Text Felder im sync storage (in synchronisierten Chrome Installationen verfügbar), außer input type password.
extension_description.description: The description of the extension, displayed in the web store.

tooltip_disable.message: Text will no longer be automatically saved when it shortens by more than the given number of characters from its last autosave length. Autosaving resumes when it grows within bounds again.
tooltip_disable.description: Text will no longer be automatically saved when it shortens by more than the given number of characters from its last autosave length. Autosaving resumes when it grows within bounds again.

tooltip_export.description: Exports all entries to a local file.

tooltip_import.message: Alle Einträge aus lokaler Sicherungsdatei laden.
tooltip_import.description: Imports all entries from a local file.

tooltip_sync_status.message: Google Chrome kann bis zu $MaxItems$ Einträge mit insgesamt $QuotaBytes$ Zeichen zwischen browsern eines eingeloggten Benutzers synchronisieren
tooltip_sync_status.description: Google Chrome can synchronize up to $MaxItems$ items with a total size of $QuotaBytes$ between browers a user is logged in to.

maxitems.example: Google Chrome can synchronize up to $MaxItems$ items with a total size of $QuotaBytes$ between browers a user is logged in to.

quotabytes.example: Google Chrome can synchronize up to $MaxItems$ items with a total size of $QuotaBytes$ between browers a user is logged in to.

tooltip_minimum.message: Text will only be automatically saved when it has at least the given number of characters.
tooltip_minimum.description: Text will only be automatically saved when it has at least the given number of characters.

tooltip_timeout.message: Text will be saved automatically when no changes to it are made within a timeout period in seconds. Any change restarts the timeout operation.
tooltip_timeout.description: Text will be saved automatically when no changes to it are made within a timeout period in seconds. Any change restarts the timeout operation.
